installer.title: Block Language Toolkit Testing
installer.description: Installer for the Block Language Toolkit testing environment.

panel.title: ILS Automation Installer for testing the Block Language Toolkit
panel.preamble: Welcome to the ILS Automation installer for setup of a testing environment for the Block Language Toolkit. This installer is meant to operate against a base that contains a bare Ignition instance. No database connection is required. The table below compares the existing installation of this environment, if any, with the versions contained in this new installation. Before continuing, please make sure that you have defined tag providers TAG and TAG_ISOLATION. (These names are hard-coded into the testing scripts.)

panel.title: Clear existing test files
panel.preamble: This step clears all existing test files in preparation for installation of the new.

panel.title: Update Toolkit Properties
panel.preamble: Set properties in the internal database of the Gateway. These include production and isolation mode tag provider names. We also remove all extension functions that involve database operations.

panel.title: Install Tags for Testing
panel.preamble: This page defines tags that are needed by the applications when running in PRODUCTION mode.

panel.title: Install Tags for Testing
panel.preamble: This page defines tags that are needed by the applications when running in ISOLATION mode. (These are identical to those for PRODUCTION.

panel.title: Install Custom Modules
panel.preamble: This step installs modules necessary for Block Language Toolkit Testing.

panel.title: Install the BasicDiagrams Project
panel.preamble: The BasicDiagrams project contains sample scenarios involving each class of diagrams.

panel.title: Install test files
panel.preamble: This step adds test scripts to the filesystem inside the user's home directory. It also initializes preferences for the TestFramework control dialog.

panel.title: Installation Summary
panel.preamble: The list below shows which of the installation steps have been completed. Selecting "Finish" will record the current version of the BLT test environment into the Gateway internal database.

epilog.title: Installation Complete
epilog.preamble: The automated installation and configuration of the BLT test environment is complete. There are just a few more manual steps required.
epilog.note: The newly created BasicDiagrams project has been installed disabled. It must be enabled before use.
Several modules with active components have been installed. A Gateway restart is required.
